question.title: java.util.Date format mismatch while setting value in spring application
question.body: I have a date "08-10-2020". I want to set that string into a java.util.Date property in the same format. But even after using SimpleDateFormat to format the date, it is still setting in "Mon dd, yyyy hh:mm:ss AM" format. Because when I am using objectMapper to convert that object into entity, it is giving me illegalArgumentExpression exception for the date. What shall I do in order to convert the objects
